name: Flippy
description: The Flippy the Switch project is a meme coin built on the XRPL (XRP Ledger) ecosystem. It focuses on community-driven initiatives, aiming to create a fun and energetic environment within the cryptocurrency space. The project incorporates organic community engagement, including token burns, giveaways, contests, and other interactive activities. Its core mission is to bring together meme coin enthusiasts while leveraging the XRPL blockchain for speed and efficiency, all while promoting the $FLIPPY token as a symbol of fun and connection.
